gym_mizu_020_receptionist_01:
I’m sure Kofu is real sad about forgetting his
wallet here...
gym_mizu_020_receptionist_02:
Please take it to him in [VAR COLOR(0006)]Porto Marinada[VAR COLOR(0000)], on the
other side of the desert! I’m counting on you!
gym_mizu_020_mizu_26: Vaultin’ Veluza! Where?! Where in the world...?[VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_mizu_27: Where in the world is my wallet?![VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_mizu_28:
Without my wallet, I won’t be able to get today’s
hot item! It’ll get bought up by someone else![VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_trainer_01b:
Don’t worry, ol’ man Kofu! I’ll run and look for it
right now!
gym_mizu_020_trainer_02:
Whaddya want? Ol’ man Kofu’s in the middle of
some superduper important ingredient buyin’!
gym_mizu_020_trainer_03:
If yer thinkin’ about tryin’ to interrupt him, then
I—his best apprentice—will have to stop you!
gym_mizu_020_trainer_04:
So do ya have somethin’ super important to
say to us busy folks, or what?
gym_mizu_020_select_b: Uh, I guess it’s not that important...
gym_mizu_020_trainer_05:
Don’t bother us with somethin’ unimportant! Run
back on home now, y’hear!
gym_mizu_020_trainer_06:
Super important, eh? We’ll see about that!
Maybe a battle will shut yer mouth!
gym_mizu_020_trainer_07:
Dangit! That backfired... And now my wallet’s
empty, too!
gym_mizu_020_mizu_01:
Heya, step right up...and tell me—what’s all the
ruckus about over here?[VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_trainer_08:
O-ol’ man Kofu! Seems this kid’s got somethin’
to say to ya.
gym_mizu_020_mizu_02:
What’s that, now? A customer here for little ol’
walletless, moneyless me? What kin I do for ya?[VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_system_01: You returned Kofu’s wallet to him!
gym_mizu_020_mizu_04:
Say what, now? My lobby staffer sent ya out here
to bring it to me?[VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_mizu_05:
Gahaha! That’s a huge help! Thanks for comin’
all this way![VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_mizu_06:
I guess I should apologize for my li’l apprentice,
too. Hope he didn’t bother ya too much![VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_mizu_07:
There’s somethin’ here at the Porto Marinada
[VAR COLOR(0006)]auction[VAR COLOR(0000)] that we really wanna get our hands on.[VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_mizu_08:
So, as you kin imagine, we were both a bit
worked up to find I’d forgotten my wallet![VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_shop_01:
Ladies and gents! You won’t wanna miss this!
Here comes today’s last item!
gym_mizu_020_shop_02:
Feast yer eyes on the main event! I have ’ere the
legendary wakame seaweed of the Hoenn region!\r
Do I have any takers?
gym_mizu_020_mizu_11:
I don’ even have to touch it—I can see it’s got the
springy texture of seaweed chock-full o’ nutrients![VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_mizu_12:
An’ just look at it! Look how it catches the light
and shines so brilliantly![VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_mizu_13:
Ohhh, and that rich, fresh aroma of somethin’
plucked straight outta the ocean![VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_mizu_14: I need to get me some o’ that![VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_mizu_15:
Now listen, kid. If you wanna challenge me at the
Cascarrafa Gym, you’re gonna need some smarts.[VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_mizu_16:
And this is the perfect place to test ya! Get the
winnin’ bid on that seaweed for this ol’ man![VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_select_04: OK! I’ll give it my best shot!
gym_mizu_020_mizu_17:
Well, ya see...here at the auction, you gotta
compete with other customers for goods!\c
You gotta be aware of how much money ya have,
o’ course, but the person who bids the highest\r
price gets to buy whatever’s on sale![VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_mizu_18:
Gahaha! You already know the ins an’ outs of
auctions at such a young age?\c
You’re somethin’ else, kid![VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_mizu_19:
Here ya are. Fightin’ funds for the auction! Be
smart with it, an’ win this ol’ man that seaweed![VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_seri_02:
Hoenn’s legendary wakame seaweed! We’ll start
the biddin’ at [VAR NUM6(0001,002C)]!
gym_mizu_020_seri_system_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]The current price is [VAR NUM6(0002,002C)]. What will
you bid?
gym_mizu_020_seri_03a:
Aaand we have [VAR NUM6(0005,002C)]! We’re at [VAR NUM6(0005,002C)]!
Do I hear more?
gym_mizu_020_seri_03b:
I hear a bid for [VAR NUM6(0005,002C)]! Do I hear more?
We’re currently at [VAR NUM6(0005,002C)]!
gym_mizu_020_seri_04a:
Sold! Sold for [VAR NUM6(0001,002C)] to the little gentleman
over there!
gym_mizu_020_seri_04b:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Sold! Sold for [VAR NUM6(0001,002C)] to the little lady
over there!
gym_mizu_020_mizu_20:
That was amazin’! You put those grown-up
bidders to shame with yer biddin’ skills![VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_mizu_21:
Thank ya for winnin’ that seaweed for this ol’
man. I’ll be takin’ it now, if ya don’t mind.[VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_system_02:
You handed the legendary wakame seaweed
to Kofu!
gym_mizu_020_mizu_22:
This seaweed’s a great catch! I’d be feelin’ low
as the seabed if I’d failed to get my hands on it![VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_mizu_23:
If there’s any o’ that money I gave ya left, feel
free to keep it as a tip!\c
You kin even use it to try yer hand at the auction
again if ya like![VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_mizu_24:
All righty. I’mma head on back to the Cascarrafa
Gym now.[VAR 0114(0018)]
gym_mizu_020_mizu_25:
Ol’ man Kofu’s gonna prepare a REEL good
battle fer ya! See ya there![VAR 0114(0018)]
